com.arcrobotics.ftclib.hardware.motors

Class MotorEx

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.arcrobotics.ftclib.hardware.motors.MotorEx
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HardwareDevice, Motor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MotorImplEx

    public abstract class MotorEx
extends java.lang.Object
implements Motor
    An extended motor class that utilizes more features than the regular motor. This is basically a rewrite of DcMotor in the basic SDK, but has more features and a more powerful PIDF control.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MotorEx.RunMode
      The mode of the motor.
      static class  MotorEx.ZeroPowerBehavior
      The behavior of the motor when a speed of 0 is passed.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      The counts per revolution of the output shaft, usually listed in the specs for the motor.
      EncoderEx encoder
      The internal encoder for the motor.
      java.lang.String runMode 
      java.lang.String zeroBehavior 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MotorEx(Motor mot, double cpr)
      The constructor for the motor without a PIDF controller.
      MotorEx(Motor mot, double cpr, PIDFController controller)
      The constructor for the extended motor that includes a PIDFController.

      • setTargetPosition

        public void setTargetPosition(double target)
        Sets the target position of the motor.

        If the motor is not in RUN_TO_POSITION, this will throw a NullPointerException.

        Parameters:
        target - The specified target of the motor.
